default.info: the default classic PvPvE Facility Gamemode settings.
default.author: Sharp-Shark

nomonsters.info: the default gamemode with all monsters removed.
nomonsters.author: Sharp-Shark

huskmode.info: monsters are now player controlled husks.
huskmode.author: Sharp-Shark

jetinvasion.info: a PvP only mode where staff+guards defend agaisnt the JET.
jetinvasion.author: Sharp-Shark

prisonescape.info: a PvP only mode where the guards must kill all the escapees.
prisonescape.author: Sharp-Shark

scp:cb.info: inspired by SCP:CB, JET+inmates fight agaisnt the monsters and people only respawn as MERCS.
scp:cb.author: SonicHegehodge

surfacetension.info: endless team PvP gamemode with JET vs MERCS at surface zone.
surfacetension.author: Sharp-Shark

ffa.info: endless FFA (Free For All) gamemode with guards. No decontamination.
ffa.author: Sharp-Shark

trollmode.info: monsters are now player controlled trolls, a stronger and dumber subspecies of goblins.
trollmode.author: Sharp-Shark

greenskinlair.info: the facility has become a greenskin lair and the JET are here to clean things up.
greenskinlair.author: Sharp-Shark

vietnam.info: the facility has become a greenskin lair and the MERCS are here to clean things up.
vietnam.author: Sharp-Shark
